stepAnswer: A model that memorizes the training data and performs poorly on new data
stepTitle: What is the correct definition of overfitting?
stepBody: What is the correct definition of overfitting?
choices: A model that memorizes the training data and performs poorly on new data
A model that simplifies to improve generalization
A model that performs equally well on training and test data
A model that ignores the training data and predicts randomly
answerLatex: A model that memorizes the training data and performs poorly on new data
